description: two farm houses with several sheds in a foggy valley, with trees in background; man seated on porch swing, standing woman and cats on porch of larger house in foreground
inscription:
Title, Signature, Date, Inscription and Stamp

on back, in pencil: various notes and inscriptions
markings: on back, stamped in black: photographer\'s address stamp
signed: on back, in pencil: [Home At The Head of A Hollow.  Letcher County, Kentucky 1977.  T Wathen (c)]
title: Home at the Head of a Hollow, Letcher County, Kentucky
